news.name: The rise of Haaland - and what happens next
news.description: The 21-year-old scored 86 goals in 89 games for Dortmund and arrives at the Premier League champions as one of world football's most coveted forwards. He has signed a five-year deal until 2027 and will join the club on 1 July.

news.name: Georgia investigators are monitoring the Jan 6. committee hearings for relevant testimony
news.description: Georgia investigators looking into potential criminality around then-President Trumpâ€™s efforts to overturn the 2020 election results in the state are keeping an eye on the Jan. 6 hearings for anything relevant to their case, according to a person familiar with the matter.
